metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the female Dwarf worker outside of the Baldurs Mouth building.

0.speaker: Zita
0.text: Between you and me - I don't even read 'em. Quality of reporting is arse these days.

1.speaker: Zita
1.text: Look, I just pack the papers. If you got a complaint - editor's inside.
